message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest if we want to avoid inflation eating our money.
Let's split things a bit more fairly this time, Alice. Remember, the clock is ticking.
Bob, my offer is still the most sensible. Let's be practical - time is literally money for us!
Alice, I'm proposing a fair 50/50 split.  Let's end this before inflation eats away any more of our potential gains.
